info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 27 at 4:29PM MST until July 27 at 4:45PM MST by NWS Tucson
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 445 PM MST FOR SOUTH CENTRAL SANTA CRUZ COUNTY... At 427 PM MST, a severe thunderstorm was located over Patagonia Lake State Park, or 10 miles northeast of Nogales, moving west at 15 mph. HAZARD...70 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. At 415 PM, 73 mph wind gust was reported at Patagonia station, near Patagonia Lake. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect considerable tree damage. Wind damage is also likely to mobile homes, roofs, and outbuildings. Locations impacted include... Nogales, Rio Rico, Patagonia, Nogales International Airport and Patagonia Lake State Park. THUNDERSTORM DAMAGE THREAT...CONSIDERABLE HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...70 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building.
